item.title: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser
item.description: SoftLayer_Software_Description_RequiredUser Datatype Description This class represents a software description’s required user Local defaultPassword If the default password is set the user will be created with that password, otherwise a random password is generated. Type: string username If this software has a required user (such as "root") this string contains it's name. Type: string
